DashboardRightSidebar.infoTooltip: Suggestions are based on your profile interests and needs.
DashboardRightSidebar.signInPrompt: Sign in to get personalized suggestions.
DashboardRightSidebar.noSuggestions: No new suggestions right now. Check back later!
DashboardRightSidebar.promotionsDescription: See special offers and deals from partners in the ecosystem.
DashboardRightSidebar.adDescription: Get real-time data and analytics with DamDoh Pro.

AppFooter.tagline: The Global Agricultural Supply Chain Platform.

hero.title: Empowering Agriculture from Soil to Sale on {appName}
hero.subtitle: A unified platform connecting every stakeholder in the agricultural value chain for a more transparent, efficient, and sustainable future.

features.title: Core Features of DamDoh
features.subtitle: Everything you need to grow, connect, and trade, all in one place.

networking.title: Smart Networking
networking.description: AI-powered connection suggestions to link you with the right partners, from suppliers to international buyers.

marketplace.title: Direct Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell products and services directly, increasing transparency and profitability for all stakeholders.

forums.title: Thematic Forums
forums.description: Share knowledge, discuss challenges, and collaborate on solutions in dedicated topic-specific forums.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer or find specialized agricultural services, from custom harvesting to drone surveying.

forWho.title: A Platform for the Entire Value Chain
forWho.description: DamDoh is uniquely designed to serve the entire agricultural ecosystem, creating a single point of truth and opportunity for all.

farmers.title: Farmers
farmers.description: Access better markets, find quality inputs, and get expert advice to increase yield and profitability.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from growers and cooperatives, ensuring supply chain reliability.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your specialized skills and services to a vast agricultural audience seeking your expertise.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural stakeholders collaborating

cta.title: Join the Agricultural Revolution
cta.subtitle: Sign up today and become part of a growing global network dedicated to transforming the future of food.

Auth.signInDescription: Enter your credentials to access your dashboard.
Auth.recoverWithUniversalIdPrompt: Or recover access with your Universal ID
Auth.signUpDescription: Tell us a bit about yourself to get started.
Auth.namePlaceholder: e.g., Jane Doe or Green Valley Farms
Auth.rolePlaceholder: Select your role in the supply chain...
Auth.forgotPasswordDescription: No problem. Enter your email address below and we'll send you a link to reset it.
Auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter and confirm your new password below.

recoverPage.title: Recover Your Account
recoverPage.description: Use your network to regain access.
recoverPage.step1: Enter your phone number to start a recovery session.
recoverPage.step2: Show the temporary QR code to a trusted friend on DamDoh.
recoverPage.step3: Once your friend scans the code to confirm your identity, you'll regain access.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Have a trusted DamDoh connection scan this QR code using the 'Help a Friend Recover' feature in their app.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is temporary and expires in 10 minutes.

StartPost.placeholder: Start a post, ask a question, or share an update...

CreatePostModal.title: Create a post
CreatePostModal.description: Share your thoughts with the community.
CreatePostModal.pollNote: Create a poll with up to {maxOptions} options.
CreatePostModal.pollOptionsError: A poll must have at least two options filled out.
CreatePostModal.emptyPostError: Your post cannot be empty. Please add some text, an image, or a poll.

FeedItemCard.signInToLikeToast: You must be signed in to like a post.
FeedItemCard.signInToVoteToast: You must be signed in to vote.

Marketplace.title: Marketplace
Marketplace.description: Discover, buy, and sell agricultural products and services.

pinning.pinnedDescription: The Marketplace is now your default homepage.
pinning.unpinnedDescription: Your homepage has been reset to the default.

noItemsFound.title: No Items Found
noItemsFound.hint: Try adjusting your search filters or check back later.

search.title: Search Failed
search.description: Could not retrieve marketplace items at this time.

notFound.description: The listing you are looking for could not be found.

loadItem.description: There was an error loading this item.

coupon.label: Have a coupon code?
coupon.successDescription: Your {type} discount of {discount} has been applied.
coupon.failDescription: The coupon code is not valid for this seller or has expired.

booking.authDescription: You must be logged in to book this service.
booking.dateError: Please select a check-in and check-out date.
booking.successDescription: Your booking has been confirmed. You'll receive details shortly.
booking.bookedDescription: Show this QR code at check-in.
booking.modalDescription: Present this QR code for your booking of {itemName}.
booking.modalScan: Scan this code at the venue for easy check-in.

order.title: Place an order for {itemName}
order.description: Confirm the quantity and add any notes for the seller.
order.authDescription: You must be logged in to place an order.
order.quantityErrorDescription: Please enter a quantity greater than zero.
order.successDescription: Your order has been sent to the seller.
order.failDescription: There was an error placing your order. Please try again.

createListing.title: Create New Marketplace Listing
createListing.description: Fill out the details below to list your product or service.

form.namePlaceholder: e.g., Organic Hass Avocados, Tractor Repair Service
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your product or service in detail...
form.relatedVtiDescription: Link this listing to a specific harvest batch for full transparency.
form.skillsPlaceholder: e.g., Crop Dusting, Soil Analysis, Organic Certification
form.sustainableDescription: Check this if your product or service follows recognized sustainable practices.

missingInfo.title: Missing Information
missingInfo.description: Please fill in the Title and Description before suggesting a price.

failed.title: AI Suggestion Failed
failed.description: Could not get a price suggestion at this time.

authentication.title: Not Authenticated
authentication.description: You must be logged in to create a listing.

creation.title: Creation Failed
creation.description: An unexpected error occurred while creating the listing.

success.title: Listing Created!
success.description: Your item is now live on the marketplace.

myOrders.title: My Incoming Orders
myOrders.description: Manage orders placed by buyers for your listings.
myOrders.noOrders: You have no incoming orders at this time.

auth.title: Please Sign In
auth.description: You need to be logged in to view your orders.

promotions.title: My Promotions & Coupons
promotions.description: Create and manage coupon codes to boost sales for your products.

list.title: Your Active Coupons
list.description: Share these codes with potential buyers.
list.noCoupons: You haven't created any coupons yet.
list.toastDescription: A shareable link for coupon {link} has been copied to your clipboard.

shareModal.title: Share Coupon
shareModal.description: Copy this link and share it with your customers.

createShop.title: Create Your Digital Shopfront
createShop.description: Establish your brand on DamDoh with a dedicated shop page to showcase all your listings.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell customers about your business, your mission, and what you offer.

toast.failDescription: There was an error creating your shop.

createShop.authErrorDescription: You must be logged in to create a shop.

shopView.noListings: This shop has no active listings yet.

bookingsTab.title: Guest Bookings
bookingsTab.description: View and manage all bookings for this service.
bookingsTab.noBookings: There are no bookings for this service yet.

Forums.title: Community Forums
Forums.description: Connect, share knowledge, and collaborate with stakeholders from across the agricultural supply chain.

noPosts.title: No Posts Yet
noPosts.description: Be the first to start a conversation in this topic.

notFound.title: Topic Not Found
notFound.description: The discussion topic you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been moved.

loadTopic.title: Load Error
loadTopic.description: Could not load the details for this topic.

loadPosts.title: Load Error
loadPosts.description: Could not load posts for this topic.

create.title: Start a New Discussion Topic
create.description: Create a new topic to gather insights and collaborate with the community.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: What is this topic about? A brief description helps others understand its purpose.

auth.title: Authentication Required
auth.description: You must be signed in to create a new topic.

incomplete.title: Incomplete Information
incomplete.description: Please provide both a name and a description for your new topic.

general.title: Creation Failed
general.description: An unexpected error occurred while creating the topic.

success.title: Topic Created!
success.description: Your new discussion topic is now live.

aiHelper.title: Need help starting?
aiHelper.description: Use our AI Assistant to draft your post. Just provide a prompt below.
aiHelper.promptPlaceholder: e.g., 'Ask about the best organic pesticides for coffee leaf rust'

createPost.title: Create a New Post
createPost.description: Share your thoughts, ask a question, or start a discussion.

form.titlePlaceholder: Enter a clear and concise title

aiPromptMissing.title: Prompt Required
aiPromptMissing.description: Please enter an idea or question for the AI to generate a draft.

aiDraft.title: AI Draft Failed
aiDraft.description: There was an error generating the draft. Please try again or write the post manually.

incomplete.title: Incomplete Post
incomplete.description: Please provide both a title and content for your post.

general.title: Post Creation Failed
general.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

aiDraft.title: Draft Generated!
aiDraft.description: The AI has generated a draft below. Feel free to edit it before publishing.

success.title: Post Published!
success.description: Your post is now live in the topic.

postView.noReplies: No replies yet. Be the first to respond!

notFound.title: Post Not Found
notFound.description: The post you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

loadPost.title: Error
loadPost.description: Could not load the post details.

loadReplies.title: Error
loadReplies.description: Could not load replies for this post.

submitReply.title: Reply Failed
submitReply.description: Could not submit your reply. Please try again.
